segments.text: The boy is so determined to get those cookies, it’s almost funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s balancing on that stool like a circus performer.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she knows he’s going to drop one for her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely oblivious to all of this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out of the sink, and she doesn’t even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how much water is on the floor now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is going to tip, and the boy is going to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn’t hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so excited, she doesn’t even notice the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is a mess, but it’s kind of charming in a weird way.
segments.speaker: PAR
